item.description:
This event is sponsored by several groups (Crawl in Boston, Social Boston Sports, Buy Your Friend a Drink and Jumpstart).

I finally have the schedule for the crawl:

JA Stats/The Times: 2PM - 3:30PM
The Place/Kitty O'Shea's: 3:30PM - 5PM
McFadden's/Hong Kong: 5PM - 6:30PM
Bell in Hand/The Point: 6:30PM - 8 PM
Hurrican O'Reilly's: 8PM - Close

I still think meeting up for lunch beforehand would be a good idea. Let's say Coogan's (171 Milk Street) at 1 PM.

Now let's all go out and celebrate (or have fun forgetting) that we're single!
item.name: Pub Crawl - Celebrating being Single on Valentine's Day
